title: Are there free apps to make beats for songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: atleast for android, there is an app called “MidSequer” that is free and doesn’t require much skill to use. i sometimes have an idea for a composition sitting awake at night, and then instead of getting up to my pc i can just use my phone to compose whatever i was thinking of with this app

I say go for GarageBand if you have an IOS device. It’s pretty intuitive and easy to use. If you learn about the software, you can even produce high quality music. But as a beginner, you can use a large variety of pre-recorded loops.
